column4: This pillar serves as the site's high-intent economic hub. It integrates macro-level Industries & Markets with micro-level Money & Investing and Insurance & Personal Finance to capture the full financial lifecycle. By including Career & Education, it targets professional growth, while Tech & Productivity focuses on the digital tools required for modern business operations. The logic is to create a "Professional Ecosystem" that attracts high-value B2B advertisers and high-net-worth individual investors.
